title: "The Hooker and the Southern Belles" - A new group for your enjoyment
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: "The Hooker and the Southern Belles" - A new group for your enjoyment
posts.post_content:
For sale today I am offering a bevy of beauties who refused plastic surgery and therefore had to be upgraded.  All are for sale individually or as a group.

#1 - The Lead Singer - Bock Hooker - SOLD
       You wouldn't want to go where you could find a cheaper hooker.;)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10940/hooker-sl[/IMG]

#2 - Backup #1 - Perry "Don't Call Me Como" Lipe - $40 Pending
       A Mendoza Line third sacker who managed the Albany Babies in 1916
       
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10968/lipe-sl[/IMG]

#3 - Backup #2 - "A Boy Named Sydney" Smith - $38 Pending 
        The only T206 with a first name on the card and it's misspelled.:eek:

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10955/smith-s-omsl[/IMG]

#4 - Backup #3 - Al "From the South not the N" Orth - $42 Pending
       Nicknamed "The Curveless Wonder", which explains why his career as a hooker was a grave disappointment

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10798/orth-sl[/IMG]

Take the remaining three for $115 and I'll throw in their iTunes download.

All prices include shipping and any form of legitimate payment is accepted.
If you prefer regular PP, please add $2 per card or $6 for the whole enchilada.
Frank - I'll take them - I found that the songs have a nice beat - easy to dance to.
The back of the Smith looks kinda Brown . . .

[quote name="usernamealreadytaken" post=1273212]The back of the Smith looks kinda Brown . . .[/QUOTE]

Oh no, let's not get this started again.  :D:D
If any of the sales don't work out (hopefully they do) please let me know.

[quote name="usernamealreadytaken" post=1273212]The back of the Smith looks kinda Brown . . .[/QUOTE]

Nah, the OLD MILL and Cigarettes is faded black. The thinner fonts are an illoptical allusion:eek:
agreed.... it is not a brown back
